title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Public Expenditure and Reform
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Public Expenditure and Reform 

(Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2023. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 February 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited public expenditure reform (alteration name department title minister) order 2023 (2) order come operation 1 february 2023

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, an Roinn Caiteachais Phoiblí agus Athchóirithe and, in the 
English language, the Department of Public Expenditure and Reform, is 
altered, in the Irish language, to that of an Roinn Caiteachais Phoiblí, 
Seachadta ar an bPlean Forbartha Náisiúnta, agus Athchóirithe and, in the 
English language, to that of the Department of Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name irish language roinn caiteachais phoibli agus athchoirithe english language department public expenditure reform altered irish language roinn caiteachais phoibli seachadta ar bplean forbartha naisiunta agus athchoirithe english language department public expenditure national development plan delivery reform

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State,
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, 
whose present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Caiteachais Phoiblí agus 
Athchóirithe and, in the English language, the Minister for Public Expenditure 
and Reform, is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an tAire Caiteachais 
Phoiblí, Seachadta ar an bPlean Forbartha Náisiúnta, agus Athchóirithe and, in 
the English language, to that of the Minister for Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform.

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment –
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment – 

(a) 

(b) 

references to the Department of Public Expenditure and Reform 
shall be construed as references to the Department of Public 
Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and Reform, 
and 

references to the Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform 
shall be construed as references to the Minister for Public 
Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and Reform. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [19] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

31 January, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [19]
